scene_description_enriched: A full-length depiction of a knight in full armor stands against a gold leaf background with a diamond pattern. He wears a helmet with a mail coif, a surcoat with a red cross, and mail leggings. A blue belt cinches his waist, and a sword is sheathed at his side. He holds a long spear upright in his left hand and a shield bearing a red cross in his right. The figure is framed by decorative borders. The scene is likely devotional, possibly representing a saintly knight or a figure associated with the Crusades.
